title: Mir
detail: ML mirror that tracks your fashion style and provides you data visualization / recommendations
extended_details: Smart mirror that tracks your outfits everyday, and provide you data visualization on various subjects. For example, how many times you wore that outfit, what your color palette is in your wardrobe, etc.
